Reviews.Title: flash quality is poor
Reviews.Author: tammy cook
Reviews.Content: If you plan on taking pictures at night with the flash on this camera, forget it! I used it outside and talk about black! the flash is not bright at all. for the money, it is maybe worth 40.00 at the most. I paid 100.00 and still may return it!!!

Reviews.Title: Affordable and Fun
Reviews.Author: K. M. Decker
Reviews.Content: I needed a new camera, one that wasn't super expensive, but was a good purchase.  This is a pretty good one.  I like that's it's mostly all touch-screen.  It does take some playing around with to figure out how to use it, but I've really enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: very frustrating
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this camera but it is very frustrating. It came with a user manual which is impossible to read without a magnifing glass and a translator and I can find no help on line. I am going to junk it and start over. it is not at all intuitive.

ProductInfo.Features:
1280x720p HD Video and 12 MP max resolution
Auto face detection and Auto smile shutter
2.7 inch LCD touchscreen display
5x digital zoom
SDHC expandable up to 32GB
ProductInfo.Name: Bell+Howell T90HD-BK 12 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD Touchscreen & HD Video
